text:
@MiamiHerald @gtconway3d We urge Gov. Gavin Newsom (D), of California, Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D), of New York, or Gov. Ned Lamont (D) of Connecticut to share how to handle Coronavirus with Florida’s governor Rick DeSantis (R) quickly.

Read more here: https://t.co/RYuTSV3dKM
